post.content:
Added a couple more user scenarios and updated File I/O requirements. Feel free to add/update these and other sections.

http://filegate.wikispaces.org/srs.html

Note: There was a question regarding whose company is borasoft.com, or wikispaces.org for that matter. Even if I do not understand the true intention of that question, it is all ir-relevant. I am providing all of these, and I am the one who is providing the server where the current web drive is sitting as well. If anyone is willing to contiribute web hosting for free, I would not mind changing it to filegate.YourGoodWillCompany.com.

All of these are going to change anyway because we cannot use the name FileGate that would have been already copyrighted.

On a different note, the souce code comments, FileGate forum postings, web drive, e-mail, and homepage are all complementary communication mechanisms. Each of these has its own purpose - i.e. they are not mutually exclusive. For example, I would use forums for on-going discussion but use homepage for organizing documents or meeting minutes. It is not like you choose one or the other.

My 2 cents.
